PMLs and VoxML™

Effort started at AT&T Bell Labs

PML at AT&T: see paper by Chris Ramming in "Workshop on Internet Programming Languages," May 13, 1998

PML at Lucent: see paper by David L. Atkin et.al. in Bell Laboratories Technical Journal, Winter, 1997

VoxMLTM at Motorola: see http://voxml.mot.com
